title: Google Doodle celebrates 200th birthday of French painter Rosa Bonheur
content:
As part of Google’s ongoing celebration of Women’s History Month, today their homepage logo has been replaced with a Doodle honoring Rosa Bonheur, a French painter who helped pave the way for women in the arts.

more…

The post Google Doodle celebrates 200th birthday of French painter Rosa Bonheur appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google's latest homepage Doodle honors Rosa Bonheur, a French painter who helped pave the way for women in the arts.
